parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From kata and agonizomai; to struggle against, i.e. to overcome.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To attain, obtain, acquire. From epi and tugchano; to chance upon, i.e. to attain.
A promise. From epaggello; an announcement.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To stop, close up, obstruct. Apparently a strengthening form of the base of phren; to fence or inclose, i.e., to block up.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
A lion. A primary word; a 'lion'.
